name: Infinite City
description:
A little game for the Secret Santa Jam!

Play as a night rider going through a randomly generated city. Dodge hazardous obstacles as you try to navigate you way out of the city. But what awaits for you at the end of the road?

CONTROLS:

WASD - Drive bike

Space - Jump

R - Restart at checkpoint

Escape - Exit game

Credits:

Developed by: Stuart Foley - @stuartgames_

Music by: Austin Lytle

Font by: @somepx

Models by: @KenneyNL
